text: Gumazamizir igharazibagh ifongezir gumazamiziba, me Godɨn atiatir puvatɨ. Atiatir gumaziba, me fo, me ivezir kuram iniam, ezɨ nɨghnɨzir kam me gamima, me atiati. Eghtɨ gumazamizir igharazibagh ifongezir arazim me gizɨvagh daghem otivtɨ, kamaghɨn me Godɨn atiatingan kogham. Gumazamiziba atiatingtɨ, e fo, me God me gifongezir arazim deravɨra a gɨfozir puvatɨzɨ, kamaghɨn igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazir men itimɨn dagheba puvatɨ.
